name: European Helicopter Association
goal: To speak as THE voice for the European Rotorcraft industry at the European institutions and elsewhere, including to the general public. To represent and protect the interests of the European rotorcraft sector in the international arena.To support the creation of a global infrastructure favourable to the sustainable development of the helicopter.The recognition of the rotorcraft as an environmentally acceptable and vital safety tool and an economic multiplier.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: we are officially recognised Airspace Users in the SESAR programme representing the rotorcraft Sector.
